nodes.text: Djinn Kylo was a male Force Adept who lived on Ord Mynock.

As a young boy, Kylo could see and sense things that others couldn't. He could see into the future and sense other people's emotions. When he was sixteen, he was brought to the elders of his people and surprised them by quickly learning all their skills. He was hailed as being very gifted and was sent out into the galaxy on a quest to find Jedi so that he could learn more and hone his abilities. He was given the Dakshee Holocron to aid him in his quest.
